title: 3 and Out - Ravens/Browns MNF Thriller Reaction; Gruden's Bad D; Jalen Hurts W; Week 14 Takes; College Openings; Weird QB Year; Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Ravens/Browns MNF Thriller Reaction; Gruden's Bad D; Jalen Hurts W; Week 14 Takes; College Openings; Weird QB Year; Mailbag
description:
In this episode, John reacts to the Ravens thriller of a MNF win over the Browns, explains why Jon Gruden's defensive personnel selection led to his defensive coordinator getting fired, gives his reaction to Week 14, looks at the available coaching jobs, why unrealistic expectations make mid-level SEC jobs unattractive, and why the evaluation of quarterbacks is as inexact, despite having more information than ever. He also answers listener questions in the Middlekauff Mailbag. Follow John on Twitter and SUBSCRIBE now to get all the latest content!!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
